text:
It’s no stretch to say all moms want to be good mothers. It’s hard to know if you’re doing things right, but as long as you avoid what the stars of Teen Moms do, you’re on the right track. If you want to parent like a celebrity, consider these baby products Kate Middleton and other famous moms can’t live without and are worth your money. There are a lot of hidden expenses when it comes to raising children. These aren’t those expenses. We’re about to show you the baby products famous moms can’t live without that happen to be worth your money.

We’ll run into Kate Middleton (page 8) along the way, and we’ll also find out what Gwen Stefani (page 10), Kim Kardashian West (page 12), and Beyonce (page 14) spend their mother money on.

Angelina Jolie



Product: Storksak diaper bag

Price: $100

Angelina Jolie favors Storksak’s Emily diaper bag, but it’s not made anymore. eBay sells used Emily bags, but all Storksak bags have plenty of storage space and insulated cooler compartments for bottles and other food. Every mom needs a diaper bag. Storksak just happens to be one of the baby products famous moms can’t live without.

Next: Comfort and style all in one.

Halle Berry



Product: J Brand maternity jeans

Price: $129.97

Being pregnant and looking stylish don’t have to be mutually exclusive. Sure, they cost more than standard maternity pants, but they make up for it with their comfort and style. We’re guessing that’s why they’re one of Halle Barry’s favorite items and one of the baby products celebrities use.

Next: One product, years of use.

Jaime King



Product: Nuna Zaaz high chair

Price: $299.95

The Zaaz high chair by Nuna is one of the baby products Jamie King can’t live without. The actress, known for roles in Pearl Harbor and Sin City, loves how it grows with the child. It starts as a high chair with a tray for feeding your infant and morphs into an elevated seat for your toddler. The initial price is steep, but it’s one of the baby products famous moms can’t live without, and we can see why.

Next: All moms — even celebrity moms — need this in their diaper bags.

Bridget Moynahan



Product: Boudreaux’s Butt Paste

Price: $12.34

We’re putting this in the baby products famous moms can’t live without category, but all moms need this in their diaper bags. Bridget Moynahan loves it, and what’s not to love? It’s affordable, you can buy it almost anywhere, and it prevents pesky and painful diaper rashes. That’s a winning combination.

Next: A product for famous moms — and everyone else.

Kelly Ripa



Product: Diaper Genie

Price: $49.99

The Diaper Genie is one of the baby products celebrities use, but everyone can afford one. Three-time mother Kelly Ripa loves it since it makes it so easy to get rid of a stinky diaper.

Next: The stroller a baby product entrepreneur swears by.

Jessica Alba



Product: Orbit G3 stroller kit

Price: $1,260

Jessica Alba started her own baby products company, The Honest Company, but it doesn’t make strollers. For carting her kids around, Alba goes with the Orbit G3 with its own seat and swivel base so baby can face forward or backward. The entire kit costs quite a bit, but it comes with everything you need to transport your kids.

Next: Your arms and back will thank you in the long run.

Victoria Beckham



Product: Deuter Kid Comfort

Price: $249

Going outdoors with a youngster isn’t always easy. That’s where the Deuter Kid Comfort comes in. It’s basically a backpack that holds your child, and it’s one of the baby products Victoria Beckham can’t live without. It seems like a ludicrous price, but using a transporter like this is safer than holding your baby, and your back and arms will thank you later.

Next: An affordable way to feel like royalty.

Kate Middleton



Product: Aden + Anais swaddling blankets

Price: $49.95

Of all the baby products the Duchess of York and her royal children can’t live without, the Aden + Anais swaddling blankets are the ones totally worth your money. These cotton blankets are versatile and easy to care for, and you’re going to need them anyway so why not splurge on one of the baby products celebrities use the most?

Next: One way to build tomorrow’s creative thinkers.

Molly Sims



Product: Legos

Price: $3.99

Moms want their children to grow up to be smart, creative thinkers. That’s where Legos come in. Molly Sims swears by them, and she loves them so much she hosted a Lego-themed birthday party for her son. Some Lego sets cost hundreds of dollars, but affordable kits are out there that cost just a few dollars.

Next: Getting kids out the door is slightly easier with these.

Gwen Stefani



Product: Dinosoles

Price: $30

OK, so technically this isn’t a baby product, but these dinosaur-themed shoes are something Gwen Stefani’s kids loved. They range in price and start at $30, and since you have to buy shoes anyway, why not get one of the baby products famous moms can’t live without and shoes that kids love wearing?

Next: For babies, for moms, and for everyone else.

Ming-Na Wen



Product: Aveeno baby lotion

Price: $21.53

This is one of the baby products celebrities use, such as Ming-Na Wen, but everyday moms and people without kids will love this, too. The fragrance-free Aveeno baby lotion goes on light and spreads well, and the fact you can buy it almost anywhere is a huge plus.

Next: You can bet Kim introduced Kylie to this product too.

Kim Kardashian West



Product: Baby Brezza formula mixer

Price: $224

Waking up in the middle of the night and drowsily making a bottle for a hungry baby isn’t fun. The Baby Brezza does all the work for you. That’s why it is one of the baby products celebrities use, such as Kim Kardashian West and her sister, Khloe Kardashian.

Next: For when you need style and substance.

Mindy Kaling



Product: Cybex Priam stroller by Jeremy Scott

Price: $1,700

When you want style and substance, you need to roll out in this stroller favored by Mindy Kaling. Yes, you can find cheaper strollers out there, but they won’t have gold rims on the wheels and wings on the side.

Next: This is how Queen Bey does it.

Beyonce



Product: Nursery Works Vetro crib

Price: $4,495

You want to know why Jay-Z, Beyonce, and their kids always take the best family photos? It’s because they’re all well rested. Beyonce loves the Nursery Works crib because it’s clear, eliminating the whole my-baby-is-in-jail look most cribs have. This crib might be way out of your price range, but if it leads to exceptional family photos, then it’s kind of worth it.

Next: These let you go anywhere with your kid, and your kid can go anywhere.

Holly Robinson Peete



Product: Travel John Jr.

Price: $10

As far as baby products go, this one is as close to essential as it gets. Actress Holly Robinson Peete won’t travel without a pack of Travel John Jrs. They’re basically portable, packable urinals for those times when your toddler needs to go RIGHT NOW.

Check out The Cheat Sheet on Facebook!

title: The 15 Baby Products Kate Middleton and Other Famous Moms Can’t Live Without and Are Totally Worth Your Money
